category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, removes toxicity, resolve swelling, Clears the chest and throat and alleviates pain

indications: Sore throat, rheumatic arthritis, sores and boils, traumatic injury, snake bites, asthma, aphthae, toothache, headache, burns and scalds, stranguria with turbid discharge, acute conjunctivitis

notes: This herb is said to make the Heart muscle stronger.
